FuncDef: The hwtacacs-user change-password hwtacacs-server command enables the device to change the passwords saved on the HWTACACS server. The hwtacacs-user change-password hwtacacs-server command enables the device to change the passwords saved on the HWTACACS server.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an HWTACACS server template.
The HWTACACS server template must already exist.

ExtraInfo: To change the password saved on the HWTACACS server, users can run the hwtacacs-user change-password hwtacacs-server command on the device. You do not need to change the configuration on the HWTACACS server. After the weak password dictionary maintenance function is enabled, the passwords defined in the weak password dictionary cannot be used. You can run the display security weak-password-dictionary command to view the passwords.
